Title: The Merchant of Venice
Writer: Theodore A. Liebler Jr., William Shakespeare
Actors: Julia Swayne Gordon, William V. Ranous, Florence Turner
Plot: A rich merchant, Antonio is depressed for no good reason, until his good friend Bassanio comes to tell him how he's in love with Portia. Portia's father has died and left a very strange will: only the man that picks the correct ca...
